Name: Group Flag
Description:
For using a Group OSCORE Security Context, set to 1 if the
        message is protected with the group mode

Name: Kid Context Flag
Description: Set to 1 if kid context is present in the compressed COSE object

Name: Kid Flag
Description: Set to 1 if kid is present in the compressed COSE object

Name: Partial IV Length
Description: Encodes the Partial IV length; can have value 0 to 5

Name: Extension-2 Flag
Description: Set to 1 if the OSCORE Option specifies a third byte, which includes the flag bits 16-23

Name: Nonce Flag
Description: Set to 1 if nonce is present in the compressed COSE object

Name: Extension-3 Flag
Description: Set to 1 if the OSCORE Option specifies a fourth byte, which includes the flag bits 24-31

Name: Extension-4 Flag
Description: Set to 1 if the OSCORE Option specifies a fifth byte, which includes the flag bits 32-39

Name: Extension-5 Flag
Description: Set to 1 if the OSCORE Option specifies a sixth byte, which includes the flag bits 40-47

Name: Extension-6 Flag
Description: Set to 1 if the OSCORE Option specifies a seventh byte, which includes the flag bits 48-55

Name: Extension-7 Flag
Description: Set to 1 if the OSCORE Option specifies a eighth byte, which includes the flag bits 56-63
